frontmatter.title: Map Story 1-4
frontmatter.abstract: A series of AR mobile stories that could be played at a location of the user's choosing

markdownRemark.html: These four mobile applications offered a story close to users' homes, so that users could still take part in them during the pandemic restrictions in place at the time. Each app tested a variety of new features, with all incorporating Augmented Reality and local map data, to add virtual features on top of users' surroundings that were appropriate to the story.
